scenario.description: You find yourself in a bizarre small village. A merchant's cart has been overturned, spilling valuable goods.

choices.text: Help the uncanny merchant gather their goods
choices.result: The merchant thanks you profusely and offers a paradoxical small reward.

choices.text: Pretend not to notice and walk away
choices.result: You avoid the paradoxical situation entirely.

choices.text: Steal some valuable items while helping
choices.result: You manage to pocket some items without being noticed.

result: The merchant thanks you profusely and offers a ethereal small reward.

scenario.description: In the paradoxical village square, you witness a metaphysical heated argument between two merchants over a peculiar rare artifact.

choices.result: Both merchants appreciate your fair judgment.

choices.text: Side with the surreal merchant offering you a ethereal bribe
choices.result: You receive a peculiar generous reward but feel guilty.

choices.text: Steal the uncanny artifact during the otherworldly confusion
choices.result: You successfully steal the uncanny valuable artifact.

result: Both merchants appreciate your fair judgment.
